kid cudi: hello ladies and gentlemen this is kid mescudi right here to present to you the new album rap hard on the new label midwest motherfuckin action. yall know how we do it and me and my partner melwisky we got this hot shit for you and we gon give it to you. alright so you know i been working on this album for a span of a year and a half and i hope you all get out of it of what i put into it. if not i dont give a fuck. so without further ado lets get it right into this shit. holla at me midwest action. lets go.
